item.title: Fred's Energy Group Buying Program
item.description:
Contact Information

Please email Chuck Jaschke at chuck.jaschke@gmail.com or call Fred’s Energy in Derby at 802-766-4949 for further details regarding this programme.

Intershack Propane Representative

Chuck Jaschke serves as the Intershack Propane Representative for this program.

item.title: Merchant Partner Discounts
item.description:
Intershack members have access to special discounts from local businesses and service providers who support our community.

Available Discounts

We maintain partnerships with various local businesses to provide our members with exclusive discounts and special rates.

How to Access Discounts

Contact us at intershackgroup@gmail.com for current information about:

  • Available merchant partners
  • Current discount offers
  • How to access member rates
  • Participating businesses

Supporting Local Business

These partnerships benefit both our members and local businesses, creating a network of mutual support in the Jay Peak area and Montreal communities.
